abstract: Here are some of the interesting items from the Web for your weekend reading surfaced by the technology reporters and editors of The New York Times. Among them, the cost of Logitech’s bet on Google TV, diversity in Silicon Valley and the value of your Twitter followers. The full Scuttlebot feed is on this page in the right-hand column.
snippet: Here are some of the interesting items from the Web for your weekend reading surfaced by the technology reporters and editors of The New York Times. Among them, the cost of Logitech’s bet on Google TV, diversity in Silicon Valley and the value of ...
lead_paragraph: For your enjoyment over the weekend, here’s what the reporters and editors of the New York Times tech staff found on the Web. You’ll find the day’s full Scuttlebot feed on this page in the right-hand column.

headline.main: The Best of Scuttlebot–the Weekend Reading Edition
